location.address: Muzhappilangad Drive-in Beach, Muzhappilangad, Kannur District, Kerala, India

images.caption: Vehicles driving along Muzhappilangad Drive-in Beach

history.short_description: India's longest drive-in beach and one of the best coastal stretches in Kerala, known for its hard-packed sand ideal for driving.
history.detailed: Muzhappilangad Drive-in Beach gained popularity due to its unique hard sand surface that stretches across 4 km, allowing visitors to drive cars and bikes directly on the shoreline. Over the years, it has evolved into one of Kerala's major tourist attractions, offering stunning sunset views, nearby coastal villages, and safe swimming zones. It is also close to Dharmadom Island, making the area culturally and naturally rich.

significance.tourism: India's longest drive-in beach and a major attraction in Kannur.
significance.scenic: Offers spectacular sunsets, long coastal views, and a natural backdrop of coconut groves.
significance.activities: Driving, photography, swimming, paragliding (seasonal), and beach sports.

timings.note: Driving usually restricted after sunset for safety.

activities: Drive a car or bike along the beach

entry_rules.entry_fee: No entry fee; vehicle parking may have a small charge

highlights: Unique experience driving on the beach
common_complaints: Sand may splash onto vehicles when wet
tips_from_visitors: Best to visit around 5 PM for sunset.
Drive slowly and avoid the edges during high tide.
Rinse your vehicle afterwards as saltwater may stick to wheels.

by_road.description: Accessible via NH 66; good roads connect the beach.
by_road.parking_info: Beachside parking and vehicle entry available near main entrance.

local_transport_tips: Autos easily available from Thalassery and Kannur.
Driving your own vehicle is the best way to enjoy the beach.
Two-wheeler riders should avoid soft sand patches.

nearby_food_places.name: Beachside Snack Stalls
nearby_food_places.special_notes: Fresh snacks, juices, and local bites.

nearby_food_places.name: Sheen Bakery & Cafe
nearby_food_places.special_notes: Good snacks and beverages near Thalassery.

Sunset drive → Beach snacks → Evening at Kannur town
